name: Distretto Meccatronico Regionale della Puglia - Società Consortile a responsabilità limitata
goal:
The objectives of MEDIS actions (Article 4 of the Social Statute) refer in particular to:
• Support the planning, organization and carrying out of industrial research and precompetitive
and competitive development of the enterprises on the territory, in cooperation
with public research institutions;
• Support the training, the update, the professional training of qualified researchers and
technicians in the fields of activities of interest for the companies on the territory, carrying out
analyzes and studies which can be useful for the territory;
• Support the planning and organization of Technology transfer programs, Innovation and
Training in Mechatronics programs, directed towards Apulian SMEs.
It aims at promoting and developing Innovation and Technology Transfer focusing on key
enabling technologies of transversal strategic importance for a relevant number of industrial
sectors (production/diagnostic systems according to the paradigms of "Industry 4.0"/"Intelligent
Factory", aerospace and automotive applications, security systems, etc.). Being member of the
coordinating and management committee of National Intelligent Factories Cluster (CFI), one of
the Italian National Technological Cluster, MEDIS also operates for strengthening on the
national territory a technological network on advanced manufacturing oriented to Industry 4.0
paradigms.
interests: Development, Education, Energy, Enterprise, Environment, Public Health, Research and Technology, Trade, Transport
